title: Insanely slow update speed?
body: So I've just came back to play some league. And there's an update! Yay! Until I realise the play button is literally taking forever to load. I've been waiting for  awhile now and it's just stuck on applying patches, with no other information like X/Y mbs.

replies.body: Same here... i tested my internet it's work fine when i download other thing... but i don't know why my update speed on league of legends is very slow... it's only 150Kb and drop to 100kb... and it's still drop to Kb.
